replies.author: 二白丶
replies.txt_content:
先这样操作，不行的话再执行最后的操作
打开config里的forge.cfg
把
removeErroringEntities=false
removeErroringTileEntities=false
改为
removeErroringEntities=true
removeErroringTileEntities=true

删掉World 文件夹里 region 的 0,0 [可能是你主城，慎重。]

Chunk: (at 5,5,9 in 19,11; contains blocks 304,0,176 to 319,255,191)
Region: (0,0; contains chunks 0,0 to 31,31, blocks 0,0,0 to 511,255,511)
